_header: Yet is God a courteous lord
Subjects: historical poems; Peasants’ Revolt (1381); evils of the times
_description: Moralizing verses on the Earthquake of 1382 — eleven 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) with refrain element, ‘…warning to be ware’

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Yit is God a Curteis lordAnd Mekeliche con schewe his
                    miht…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Of his gret godnesse and his grasSende vs such warnyng to be
                    ware

NLWPen395.First Lines:
ȝhit is god a curteys lord & curteysly con schaw his myght
                    & fayn he wold bryng to acorde may fynd to lyue in trouth & ryght…
NLWPen395.Last Lines:
…ȝhet by war whil we haue space & thanke þe childe
                    þat mare bare þat of his godnesse & his grace con send suche
                    warnyng to be ware
